You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

DESCRIPTION: My grid is arranged in 5 rows and 5 columns. The first row has a filled square on each end, with three empty squares in between. The second row is identical to the first. In the third row, the pattern is a filled square, an empty square, a filled square, an empty square, and a filled square. The fourth row starts with two filled squares, followed by an empty square, then two more filled squares. Finally, the fifth row mirrors the first with a filled square, three empties, and a filled square.
